mapper.select: SELECT * FROM participant p INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT group_id, msg_cnt, msg_date , MAX(msg_date) OVER(PARTITION BY group_id) AS max_date FROM message m) WHERE msg_date = max_date) m ON (p.group_id = m.group_id) WHERE p.mem_id = #{mem_id} ORDER BY max_date DESC
SELECT m.mem_nick FROM participant p INNER JOIN member m ON (p.mem_id = m.mem_id) AND group_id = #{group_id}

SELECT mem_nick, mem_profile, msg.*, NVL(mr.unread, 0) AS unread FROM message msg INNER JOIN member mem ON(msg.mem_id = mem.mem_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) unread, msg_id FROM msgreciver GROUP BY msg_id) mr ON(msg.msg_id = mr.msg_id) WHERE group_id = #{group_id} ORDER BY msg_date ASC
